ygData.subject: Re: SK Quest armor (Questions and spoiler/rumors)
ygData.msgSnippet: ... I carry my Dark Reaver, Silver one hander, and a cracked darkwood shield.  If I ever get a box of Abu Kar, I will include a Reaper of the dead (for
ygData.messageBody:
"Wilson, ThomasX B" wrote:
>

> On another subject anybody else besides me seem to be carrying a lot of
> weapons around lately? Just realized last night that I have 3 different
> weapons on me at any given time...(Thank god for EE sacks..)..
>

I carry my Dark Reaver, Silver one hander, and a cracked darkwood
shield. If I ever get a box of Abu Kar, I will include a Reaper of
the dead (for emergencies) and Fleshripper (if I get one).

Xilith
